episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1101_010:
When Dahlia, the Frontier Brain and famous
dancer, arrived on Pasio...
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1101_020:
Some sync pairs who also love dancing planned a
dance event!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_030: Dahlia! I am très happy to meet you!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_040:
The way you dance! Especially the way you
wiggle! Ooh la la! I love your style!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_050: Oh, you’re the Alluring, Soulful Dancer! Thank you!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_060: I’m happy to meet you, too!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_070:
The four of us would make the best dance team
on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_080: Yeah! Our dance event is going to be flaming hot!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_090:
Oui! Let’s put on the best performance with
our dancing!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_100: Hmm... At the risk of sounding a little greedy...
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_110:
it’d be nice if we had a few more people!
Just sayin’!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_120:
I agree! Getting a few more dance fans together
would be great!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_130: On that topic, I heard an interesting rumor.
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_140:
Apparently at night, people have been hearing
raucous voices and loud footsteps coming from
the forest...
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_150: Maybe someone’s dancing the night away there!
episode_event_specialcos05/4001_1001_170:
All riiight! It sounds a bit scary, but let’s go check
out the forest tonight!
episode_event_specialcos05/4002_1001_010: Should be around here, I think!
episode_event_specialcos05/4002_1001_020: Th-that rumor was actually about THIS?
episode_event_specialcos05/6801_1031_010:
I like the dance of
this era!
episode_event_specialcos05/6801_1001_010:
Dancing is wonderful! I can’t get enough of these
precise moves. It’s like time itself is passing within
my entire body!
episode_event_specialcos05/6801_1001_020:
You’re so fidgety... The most elegant dancing uses
one’s entire body to express the breadth of space.
episode_event_specialcos05/6801_1001_030: Want to settle this with a battle, then?
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_060: Hey, what were you doing here?
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_070:
You looked like you were trying to calm your
Pokémon down...
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_080:
Now those are some Pokémon you don’t see
every day!
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_090:
Oh, these are Pokémon from Hisui. They are called
Ursaluna and Zoroark.
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_100:
Have you heard of space-time distortions? It’s a
phenomenon that causes wild Pokémon to appear
out of nowhere. They happen on Pasio, too.
episode_event_specialcos05/4003_1001_110:
We encountered those two Pokémon in one of
those space-time distortions...
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_020: We need to focus on protecting everyone!
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_030: Akari and I will draw the Pokémon’s attention...
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_040: While they’re distracted, you two deal with them!
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_070: It’s gonna be tough, but I know you two can do it!
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_080:
Just keep your eye on the Pokémon and throw the
Poké Ball in a straight line!
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_090:
And most importantly, don’t be afraid of the
Pokémon—face it head on!
episode_event_specialcos05/4004_1001_130: Same to you! Don’t rush your throw!
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_010: And that’s how they caught Ursaluna and Zoroark.
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_020:
But they both go out of control when they’re let
out of their balls. Probably because they’re in
unfamiliar land...
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_030:
So, to avoid disturbing other people and
Pokémon...
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_040:
we’ve been practicing how to communicate with
them at night when no one’s around.
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_050: I see... So that’s what’s been going on.
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_060: If that’s the problem, we may have a solution!
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_070:
Yup! There’s a special way to communicate your
feelings to Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos05/4005_1001_080: Let’s all danse together! Allons danse!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_030:
Trainers and Pokémon expressing their thoughts
and feelings to each other...
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_050:
So the bond between a sync pair can deepen just
by dancing together? Fascinating!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_060: Dancing does not deepen bonds just for Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_070:
When I arrived in Sinnoh, I could not speak the
language at all...
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_080:
But I managed to communicate through dance and
become friends with everyone!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_090: Dance of this era has incredible power!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_100:
Yup! It’s a performance to make everyone happy
and get them smiling!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_130:
If dancing will bring me closer to Zoroark, I’d like
to do it as well.
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_150:
The two of you can join us onstage during our
dance performance!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_160:
We’ll help you two polish your dancing skills so
we perform as a perfect team!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_170: Dance is all about having fun!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_180:
Let’s do a dance that’ll set a fire in
everyone’s hearts!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_190: Now then! What should we teach them first?
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_200: Since we all have different styles of dance...
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_210: how about we split into two groups?
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_220: Sure, that works! Now let’s start learning!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_230:
Ursaluna and I are going to build a deeper
connection than you two!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_240:
Huh? Are you suggesting that Zoroark and I are
going to lose to you?
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_250:
How could I lose to a clumsy oaf who can’t even
play the Celestica Flute?
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_260:
I don’t think you can keep up with the fast-paced
dance moves of this era.
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_270:
Oh dear... Looks like this is turning into
a showdown.
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_280: I never said this was a competition, but still...
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_290: They’re both fired up and ready to go!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_300:
Although...it might be hard to dance in
those clothes.
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_310:
Let’s start off by preparing you some lovely dance
attire!
episode_event_specialcos05/4006_1001_320: I wonder what kind of dancing they’ll do!
episode_event_specialcos05/4007_1001_030: And your dance outfits look great on you!
episode_event_specialcos05/4007_1001_040:
Thank you! It’s all thanks to your thorough
instruction!
episode_event_specialcos05/4007_1001_050:
But...I still haven’t managed to get much closer
to Zoroark...
episode_event_specialcos05/4007_1001_060:
Maybe we need more time before they’re ready
to open up…
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_010: You still don’t want to open up to me, Zoroark?
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_020:
Maybe there’s a reason besides her just being
nervous.
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_040:
Now that you mention it, when Rei showed me his
Pokédex...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_050:
I believe it said Zoroark from Hisui harbor a strong
hatred toward humans...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_060: That may be why Zoroark won’t accept me...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_080:
If a Trainer looks unhappy, their Pokémon won’t
be happy either!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_090:
That’s right! No matter what happens, believe in
your partner Pokémon...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_100: and let’s smile, dance, and have fun!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_110: That’s right... Thank you, both of you!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_120:
Some people told me that humans and Pokémon
are capable of walking side by side and
understanding each other...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_130: For their sake, I can’t give up!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_150:
Although, right now, this is the only way I can
truly express my feelings...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_180: Zoroark! Do you like the sound of my flute?
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_190: Maybe she’s telling you to keep playing it!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_200:
Then I’ll play it as much as you want—until you’re
satisfied!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1101_210:
Zoroark moved to the sound of the flute as if she
were dancing...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1101_220: Little by little, she started opening up to Irida...
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_230: Looks like your hearts have connected!
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_250:
Zoroark... From now on, will you walk by
my side?
episode_event_specialcos05/4008_1001_260: I’ll never forget the trust you’ve placed in me!
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_010: I think I’ve got it now!
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_020:
I just can’t get enough of this feeling of
acceleration!
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_040: I can’t say the same for your Pokémon, though.
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_050: Looks like Ursaluna is a fan of the moon.
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_060:
I wonder what he’s feeling while he’s roaring at
the moon...
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_070: Why don’t you try asking with a dance?
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_090:
Of course. You can express your feelings to
others through dancing.
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_100:
That’s what I do when I want to communicate my
feelings to Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_110: Is that so... I could try it with Ursaluna, I suppose.
episode_event_specialcos05/4009_1001_120: I’ll hit him with everything I’m feeling right now!
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_010:
He’s reluctant to open up to me, but he is
watching me dance...
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_030:
Does the moon look different in Pasio than it does
in Hisui?
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_040:
Whether you’re in Pasio or Hisui, the moon always
looks beautiful, doesn’t it? It illuminates people
and Pokémon.
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_050:
I want to learn how Pokémon and people are able
to live side-by-side on Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_060:
Since you’ve come all this way, do you want to
walk this path with me?
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_080:
I need your help! Will you lend me your power so
we can walk this path together?!
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_110:
but it looks like that helped them form a really
deep bond!
episode_event_specialcos05/4010_1001_120:
It’s always nice to see the moment a Pokémon and
a person become friends. I never get tired of it.
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1101_010:
A few days later, it was time for the
dance performance.
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_020:
I wonder if they managed to get closer to
the Pokémon...
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_030: Knowing Adaman and Irida, I'm sure they’re fine!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_040:
All riiight! Thank you for gathering here today,
everyone!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_050:
We’re going to split into two teams and perform
our dances. I hope you all have loads of fun!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_060: Now then, let’s start with our team!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_080: Yeah! Ursaluna and I are raring to go!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_090: Let’s channel our burning feelings...and dance!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_110: Let’s move on to the next team!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_120:
Their moves are different from ours, so look
forward to that and enjoy the show!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_130: We’re gonna share our happiness with you all!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_140: Enjoy the fun show, s’il vous plaît!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_150:
Zoroark. In all of vast space, your place has
found you.
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_160: Oh? What do those words mean?
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_170:
It’s a Pearl Clan saying. It means occasions we
must rise to are also stages where we may prove
ourselves—where we might shine our brightest.
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_200: Let’s show our dance to everyone!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_220:
Yeah! They each had different but equally
fascinating styles!
episode_event_specialcos05/4011_1001_230:
On top of that, look how friendly they’ve gotten
with their Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_010:
You’ve opened up so much with your Pokémon,
both of you!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_030:
At first, we were talking about which team was
going to win, but now...
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_040:
Right. With the dance finished, our little squabble
over who would win seems so petty now.
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_060: At this point, winning or losing doesn’t matter.
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_070:
You both did great out there! And your Pokémon
looked like they were enjoying themselves, too!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_090:
The goal of this event was to show people how
fun dancing is.
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_100:
I guess if you have to pick a winner, it’d be the
sync pair that had the most fun!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_110:
Becoming even closer friends with Pokémon
through dancing is wonderful!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_120:
It makes me want to dance with my partner
Pokémon, too!
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_140:
Seeing how much fun everyone had makes me
want to try it out.
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_170: Wait! We can’t just stay students forever.
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_180:
The beautiful dancing that connects the hearts of
people and Pokémon...
episode_event_specialcos05/4012_1001_190: Now it’s our turn to teach it!
